meaningMnemonic: Something with an <kanji>ugly</kanji> <kanji>appearance</kanji> is a <vocabulary>shameful sight</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>disgraceful behavior</vocabulary>. You feel bad just looking at it. It probably feels bad too.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
